R

readFileContent(String) - Static method in class controller.RobotIO
Method to read a file and stores its content into the _readFile attribute
readTrajFile(String) - Static method in class controller.RobotIO
Static Method to read a .traj file
recompileHashMap() - Method in class model.RobotTrajectory
Method to update the orientationHashMap after edit of the driveCommand list
replaceDriveCommand(int, DriveCommand) - Method in class view.RobotClientUI
Method to edit a driveCommand and replace its values by those of another driveCommand (used by the popupCommandEditor)
resetEditorGrid() - Method in class view.RobotClientUI
Method to reset the editor grid and its variables
resetPreviewGrid() - Method in class view.RobotClientUI
Method to reset the preview grid and the linked variables
resetRobotData() - Method in class view.RobotClientUI
Method to reset the different fields containing the sensor values (when the robot is disconnected for example)
resetTrajectory() - Method in class model.RobotTrajectory
 
RobotClient - Class in controller
Class wich allows to connect to the robot by using a socket connection (Get,Send data,connect,disconnect...)
RobotClient() - Constructor for class controller.RobotClient
 
RobotClientConsole - Class in console
Class which defines the console mode of the RP6 Client
RobotClientConsole() - Constructor for class console.RobotClientConsole
Default constructor
RobotClientUI - Class in view
 
RobotClientUI() - Constructor for class view.RobotClientUI
Create the frame.
RobotDirection - Enum in enums
Enum to define the different directions possible for the robot
RobotDirection() - Constructor for enum enums.RobotDirection
 
RobotIO - Class in controller
Static class to read, write and check the validity of trajectory files (.traj files)
RobotIO() - Constructor for class controller.RobotIO
 
RobotOrientation - Enum in enums
Enum to define the different orientation possible for the robot
RobotOrientation() - Constructor for enum enums.RobotOrientation
 
RobotSensorsData - Class in model
Class used to store and update the data sent by the robot everytime new ones are received from the RP6 robot
RobotSensorsData() - Constructor for class model.RobotSensorsData
Default constructor
RobotState - Enum in enums
Enum to get the actual state of the robot (auto or manual and what directions)
RobotState() - Constructor for enum enums.RobotState
 
RobotTrajectory - Class in model
Class which allows to store a trajectory which can be executed automatically by the robot
RobotTrajectory() - Constructor for class model.RobotTrajectory
Default constructor
RobotTrajectory(RobotClient, ArrayList<DriveCommand>, TrajectoryMode) - Constructor for class model.RobotTrajectory
Constructor with main parameters
run() - Method in class model.BlinkerUI
The run method which contains the thread logic
